As dated as paper business cards seem, unfortunately I still get asked for them! Instead of bloating a business card with titles and companies that change, I decided to experiment by putting just one line on mine - my email address: mail@philipithomas.com.

Here is my rational:

  • Email is my primary form of communication

  • My name is in my email address

  • My website is a subset of my email address

  • Upon receiving a business card, most people initiate communication with an email.

  • Additional contact information is on my website
